message.name: ERR_FV_URL_INVALID
message.locale: The More Info URL must be blank or a valid internet address.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_IMAGE_FILE_EXTENSION
message.locale: The filename specified must have a valid file extension.

message.name: ERR_FV_FILE_EXTENSION_CONTENT_TYPE_DIFFERENT
message.locale: The extention of the filename specified does not match the Content Type specified.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_SCHEMA
message.locale: The schema %1s is invalid as a data store schema. Either it is badly formed or it does not have a unique root element.
